EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name}}
Thank you for interest in Honeywell.
A member of the sales team will be in touch with you shortly. In the meantime, we wanted to ask a few quick questions to ensure you receive the best service and information.
If you prefer, tell us more about your inquiry so that we can best serve you.
- What is your company role? - What is the specific need we may help you address? - Is your question technical related or more transactional (quote/information)?
We look forward to speaking with you soon.
Kind Regards,
Perry Pelitera
Sr. Sales Representative - BGA Honeywell | Aerospace | Business & General Aviation Perry.Pelitera@Honeywell.com Mobile: 602.245.5611
